title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.10 - Agency performance rating and advance reporting requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.10 - Agency performance rating and advance reporting requirement

State Regulations

Each agency may be required, upon the request of the Director
of the Budget, to provide timely statistical reports of performance ratings and
advances in a manner prescribed by him. Such reports shall be filed
simultaneously in a timely fashion with the Director of the Budget and the

Director of Employee Relations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
156.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
